npcs.name: Algan Tinmizer
utterances: Greetings! Looking for a bashcogglinator or perhaps a metefozic thermogauge?

npcs.name: Barmaid Estella Muddyfoot
utterances: I love the smell of fresh bread in the oven!

npcs.name: Bizrinn Clamorclang
utterances: Oh! Why hello there! I am so behind on tinker work that I am not taking anymore orders at the moment...

npcs.name: Bolo Brassharp
utterances: I know you'd love to speak with me, but I'm a little busy right now.

npcs.name: Byrtle Bobblepeg
utterances: Confound it! Where did I put that ledger?  It must be around here somewhere!

npcs.name: Deputy Splitshin
utterances: Hail and welcome to the city, friend!
Well, looks like it's getting close to naptime again.

npcs.name: Diggin Diggs
utterances: Well, that suit is looking a mite worn.  Can I interest you in a new suit of fine armor?
I have some nice new suits of chain that have stood up very well.  Would you like to see them?
You can never be too careful when it comes to protection.  Here, try on one of these.

npcs.name: Drizzcopper
utterances: The answer to your question is no. I'm afraid we don't extend lines of credit at this time.

npcs.name: Drundo Parn
utterances: Don't bother me, I'm drinking!

npcs.name: Fillzer Fuzzle
utterances: Not now, I'm looking for treasure!

npcs.name: Fullgrin
utterances: Greetings, citizen. I am on guard duty.  Should you get into trouble, seek me out.

npcs.name: Ganla Dindlenod
utterances: What brings you to the fair vale of Baubbleshire? Seeking a bit of merriment among the stouts?

npcs.name: Geologist Quardifle
utterances: Sorry, friend. I don't think you'll find this discovery as intriguing as I. Please move on.
These rocks are quite interesting... I don't know where they came from. It's very strange... they don't belong in this area.
Hmmm... very interesting... what are these doing here?

npcs.name: Gornit Penwiggle
utterances: Busy, busy! Go away!
Can't you see I'm busy doing something you can't even begin to fathom?

npcs.name: Innkeeper Millbanks
utterances: Hello there! Will you be needing a room for the evening?
Hello! I'm Millbanks, the Innkeeper for this village. Welcome!
Many adventurers fresh from the road head straight in to have a hot bath.  Shall I prepare one for you?

npcs.name: Jayla Midhop
utterances: Sorry, I'd prefer not to talk right now.

npcs.name: Kaldin Deeppockets
utterances: What can I get for ya?
Come over and meet one of the most famous brewmasters in Qeynos!

npcs.name: Lozoria Shinkicker
utterances: Ahh... nothing like a pint to tide you over till the next one. Greetings, traveler! Won't you join me for an ale?
Ahh, there's nothing like a nice pint to tide you over till the next one!

npcs.name: Maela Meadows
utterances: I simply love this view.

npcs.name: Mirf Guinders
utterances: Search within your soul! Reclaim your faith! Bristlebane lives within us. Do not abandon his mirth! We are not forsaken!
Good adventurer, have faith and be well! Perhaps one day you too may serve Bristlebane!

npcs.name: Neezer Grund
utterances: Quickly now, don't think about halflings!

You thought about halflings when I said that, didn't you? It's a new technique I'm working on to help gather data about people. Raw data, nothing but the foremost thoughts on the brain. That's why it's got to be quick.
Oh it works wonderfully! I bet you're still thinking about halflings. You seem interested, how would you like to... HALFLINGS!

npcs.name: Peona Toughins
utterances: Hello there!  Can I interest you in some of the finest merchandise this side of Norrath?
Your garb looks a mite worn. Can I interest you in a fine new set of armor?
Dare I say, it's a fine day for shopping. How can I help you?

npcs.name: Rala Eurocarry
utterances: You show interest in the crafting trade.  Good.  We can always use talented artisans.  I can help you get started.  Would you be interested?

npcs.name: Remo Zigg
utterances: Leave me alone!

npcs.name: Tapster Bregun
utterances: Greetings, traveler. Is there something I can get ya today?

npcs.name: Tawli Whiskwind
utterances: Good day to you, deary! I make the most wonderful brooms--strong bristles, stout handles, and quite stylish if you ask me. Great for sweeping off your doorstep or scaring off little critters!

npcs.name: Wazzleburn
utterances: Ah, a student of the arcane.  Is there something I can help you find?
All right where is my pen?  How am I supposed to scribe anything without my pen?
Blast it! Who keeps taking all of the parchment?
Be careful, it's best not to read the scrolls.  If you want to know what they are, just ask me.

npcs.name: Yola Sindlefop
utterances: Hello there! Isn't this a lovely spot? It's not the vale, but I was too young to really remember much when we left anyway.

npcs.name: Zipiff Clamorclang
utterances: Careful where you walk! I don't want you bending a sprocket or tweaking a spring, and you mustn't crimp a cog! If I have to uncrimp just one more cog...
